import React, { useRef } from "react" import Loadable from "@loadable/component" import firebase from "gatsby-plugin-firebase" import { useCollection } from "react-firebase-hooks/firestore" import { SnapList, SnapItem, useVisibleElements, useScroll, useDragToScroll, isTouchDevice, } from "react-snaplist-carousel" import { Box } from "@material-ui/core" import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles" import IndefiniteLoading from "src/components/Loading/IndefiniteLoading" const Channel = Loadable(() => import("./Channel"), { fallback: , }) const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { width: "100%", }, box: { width: "80vw" }, item: { height: 1000, width: "100%", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", }, })) const MyItem = ({ onClick, children, visible }) => (
{children}
) const Channels = ({ user }) => { const classes = useStyles() const snapList = useRef(null) const visible = useVisibleElements( { debounce: 10, ref: snapList }, ([element]) => element ) const goToSnapItem = useScroll({ ref: snapList }) const isDragging = useDragToScroll({ ref: snapList }) return ( <> goToSnapItem(0)} visible={visible === 0}> goToSnapItem(1)} visible={visible === 1}> goToSnapItem(2)} visible={visible === 2}> goToSnapItem(3)} visible={visible === 3}> goToSnapItem(4)} visible={visible === 4}> goToSnapItem(1)} visible={visible === 1}> goToSnapItem(2)} visible={visible === 2}> goToSnapItem(3)} visible={visible === 3}> goToSnapItem(4)} visible={visible === 4}> ) } export default Channels
